text: The 2019 Kentucky Bank Tennis Championships was a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor hard courts. It was the 24th (ATP) and 22nd (ITF) editions of the tournament and was part of the 2019 ATP Challenger Tour and the 2019 ITF Women's World Tennis Tour. It took place in Lexington, United States, on 29 July–4 August 2019. ==Men's singles main draw entrants== === Seeds === {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Alex Bolt 6–4, 3–6, 6–4. ===Women's Singles=== * Kim Da-bin def. Ann Li, 6–1, 6–3 ===Men's Doubles=== * Diego Hidalgo / Martin Redlicki def. Roberto Maytín / Jackson Withrow 6–2, 6–2. ===Women's Doubles=== * Robin Anderson / Jessika Ponchet def. title: 2019 Kentucky Bank Tennis Championships
